SiteIframeWhitelistUrl.name: SiteIframeWhitelistUrl
SiteIframeWhitelistUrl.description: Represents a list of external domains that you allow to frame your Salesforce site or Experience Cloud site pages.

SiteId.description: ID of the site to include in the inline frame.

Url.description: The domain allowed to frame your Salesforce site or Experience Cloud site page. Accepts these formats: example, example.com, *example.com, and https://example.com.

SiteIframeWhitelistUrl.accessRules: Customer Portal users can’t access this object. To view this object, you must have the “View Setup and Configuration” permission.
